page.title: 02 POPULATION
page.content: The area is thinly populated. Some houses are owner_occupied, and some are rented. 26 people live in Wandlebury. Their occupations include Warden, College Head-Gardener, Civil Servant, Vet, Professor and Song-Writer. Most of the farmers, the Warden, and 2 of the Golf Club groundsmen live where they work. Other residents of the area commute. Fox Hill is an exclusive residential area containing 15 houses. 4 of the residents interviewed had lived there for an average of 13 years. The people work in Cambridge, Shelford or Saffron Walden. Most households own 2 cars. Many are keen gardeners and grow their own fruit and vegetables. It is 2 mls to the nearest shop, most go to Cambridge, or out-of-town supermarket or Shelford. Children have to go by car to school.
